document.full_text: kevin durant has managed to dodge the growing pains often required for success in the nba and now the oklahoma city thunder forward is among a handful of players headlining a generational shift in talent in the game.
document.title: thunder's durant leads generational shift in talent
lines_and_colors: kevin durant has managed to dodge the growing pains often required for success in the nba and now the oklahoma city thunder forward is among a handful of players headlining a generational shift in talent in the game.
